xwikidoc.title: Slideshow Macro

contentDescription.name: contentDescription
contentDescription.prettyName: Content description (Not applicable for "No content" type)

property.contentDescription: List of the names of the images.

property.description: The macro allows you to render a javascript powered image slideshow.
Unique identifier for the image group, needed if using the macro more than one time in a page.
The fully qualified name of the document holding images.
Array of the name of the attached images to the parent page (use this form ["image1.jpg","image2.jpg"]).
The duration of the pause between transitions between images, in milliseconds.
The duration of the transitions between images, in milliseconds.

xwikidoc.content:
A replacement of {{{[[image]]}}}. It creates an slideshow of images that automatically switch between images loaded from the macro.
It's a syntax 2.0 macro and can be used in the WYSIWYG editor.
== Installation ==
Login as Admin and use the import utility to import the XAR file.
== Usages ==
You can select it from the WYSIWYG editor or use the following syntax :
{{code}} {{slideshow id="example" parentDoc="XWiki.SlideshowMacro" imagesNames="img1.jpg,img2.jpg,img3.jpg" width="350" height="350" pauseDuration="5000" transitionDuration="800"/}} {{/code}}
|= Parameter|=Description | id|Unique identifier used when using this macro more than one time in a page. |parentDoc|The name of the document holding images as attached files. | imagesName|Comma separated list of images of the parent doc for the slideshow. | width|The width of the slideshow widget. | height|The height of the slideshow widget. |pauseDuration|The time in milliseconds to wait before switching to another image of the slideshow. |transitionDuration|The duration of the transitions between images of the slideshow in milliseconds.
== Result ==
{{slideshow id="example" parentDoc="XWiki.SlideshowMacro" imagesNames="img1.jpg,img2.jpg,img3.jpg" width="350" height="350" pauseDuration="5000" transitionDuration="800"/}}
== Copyleft ==
